page.title: 08Living in Monmouth
page.content: Many of the people living in and on the{outskirts}of Monmouth have chosen to live here because of the {rural surroundings. Commuting}to large towns poses few problems since the opening of the A.40 dual carriageway. and{motorway links. }Cardiff, Bristol, Birmingham and London are among some of the places where residents work. Large{housing estates}have been built by the council in{Overmonnow}and {Wyesham,}and{primary schools}built to serve these areas. Smaller private development is also taking place here, but{"infill" building}only is scheduled for the rural areas. A modern{Health Centre}in the town serves the community.
